item.description: Yevhenii Vasiutenko 🇺🇦 System administrator at Controlpay B.V., Lisbon Email / LinkedIn / GitHub Skills Summary Experience with Digital Ocean / Microsoft Azure and Office 365 • Completed courses without certification - Azure Administrator • 20410D: Installing and Configuring Windows Ser 2012 • 6425C: Configuring and Troubleshooting Win Serv 2008 ADD Services • ICND1 • PowerShell scripting • English – pre intermediate 👨‍💻 Experience 🏢 Office 365 System Administrator ControlPay (FEB 2021 - Present) In my last position, I was responsible for the implementation of Microsoft Office 365 from scratch.
